message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I'm proposing a 60/40 split. It benefits us both to agree sooner rather than later.
I'm willing to compromise a bit, but I still need a bigger share. Let's go with 85/15 this time. We're running out of rounds!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm lowering my share to 55% to reach a deal.  We both lose if this fails, and time is running out!
This is my final offer, Bob.  I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I won't go any lower. It's better to get something than risk losing everything.
Alice, this is it.  I'm proposing a 50/50 split. Take it or leave it. I'm done playing games. We both lose if we don't agree now!
